channel.title: [Help] shop!

item.title: [Help] shop!
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

Hello i have try follow you tut but, i canâ€™t buy items from the shop? why. i hope you can help me :(!

what i added:

NPCOptions1.java

case 3030: // Npc id
Engine.shopHandler.openshop(p, 15);
break;

case 25: //Ali food store
p.viewings = 1;
p.shopid = 15;
p.frames.showInterface(p, 278);
p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop15, p.shop15n);
p.frames.setString(p, " Alis food store", 278, 88);
break;
shop.java

public int[] shop15 = {373, 379, 385, 391};
public int[] shop15n = {70, 60, 50, 20};

player.java

public int[] shop15 = {373, 379, 385, 391};
public int[] shop15n = {70, 60, 50, 20};

shophandler.java

case 17: //Ali food stop
p.frames.setShop(p, 700); // 700 is the Shop ID
items = Engine.shops.shop15; // Declaring this from Shops.java
itemsN = Engine.shops.shop15n; // Declaring this from Shops.java
p.frames.setItems(p, -1, 64209, 93, p.items, p.itemsN);
p.frames.setItems(p, -1, 64271, 31, items, itemsN);
break;
